description:
The following nova sequence in the Nova postgresql schema should be renamed to just 'quotas_id_seq':


ALTER TABLE public.quotas_new_id_seq

--
-- Name: quotas_new_id_seq; Type: SEQUENCE OWNED BY; Schema: public;
--

------------------

When renaming tables in our SQLAlchemy script we'll need to be mindful that this leaves behind orphaned sequences on PostgreSQL.
title: postgresql schema has leftover quotas_new sequence (should be just 'quotas')
